messages.title: Make sure your voice is heard.
messages.content: And help us to deliver opportunity for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will increase the health budget every year.
Lib Dems will guarantee decent pension rises every year through their 'triple lock' guarantee.
Lib Dems will cut Income Tax for workers by an additional Â£400 a year to help with the cost of living.
Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that children are not saddled with debt.
Lib Dems will bring back proper border controls and deport those who break the rules.

issues.economy: Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that children are not saddled with debt.
issues.education: Lib Dems will end the scandal of mental health being treated as a second class service.
issues.health: Lib Dems will increase the health budget every year allowing growth in the Scottish NHS.
issues.immigration: Lib Dems will bring back proper border controls and deport those who break the rules.

images.caption: Leaflet images of Sir Menzies Campbell, various individuals, and Liberal Democrats branding.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes information about postal voting, key Liberal Democrats messages, and campaign achievements like tax cuts for ordinary workers, rising state pension, creation of Scottish jobs, and free childcare for two-year-olds.
